channel.title: Mac Support
channel.description: Support for the Mac version of OBS Studio

item.title: Elgato video capture device
item.author: invalid@example.com (Paul kallu)
item.dc:creator: Paul kallu
item.content:encoded: My Elgato capture device ( I transfer VHS tapes to digital ) is just not showing on my Mac when I go add a source, I am running Catalina , OBS is up to date & works perfectly well on Windows. I have deleted all settings, done a fresh install & still no good. I would be very grateful for any help.

item.title: Macos menubar missing in Application Capture
item.author: invalid@example.com (omiK)
item.dc:creator: omiK
item.content:encoded:
Hello! I'm having an issue with Application Capture, the macos menu bar is no longer visible, instead there is a black bar at the top. This problem started a couple days ago, before that Application Capture was working fine. Anyone else has this problem?

Working on mac mini m2 pro / Sonoma 14.2.1 / OBS 30.0.2

Vid with behaviour: https://youtu.be/Xih4lsqXCL0
Screenshot from a couple of days working fine: https://i.imgur.com/4kcz08S.png

Thanks in advance!

item.title: OBS 30.0.2 Crash in Sonoma 14.2
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pablito Key)
item.dc:creator: Pablito Key
item.content:encoded:
After I updated my Mac to Sonoma 14.2, my OBS 30.0.2 no longer opens. It even opens for 3 seconds and closes.
I have already tried previous versions of obs but the problem persists.
Someone with the same problem?

item.title: Presenter Overlay Large
item.author: invalid@example.com (PopsCycle)
item.dc:creator: PopsCycle
item.content:encoded:
Running Sonoma 14.1.2 and OBS Studio 30.0.2.

I do screen recordings of my grand daughters basketball games which are live streamed. I Use the small overlay presenter to show that I'm watching her game. and the small Presenter overlay works perfect. I can relocate it on the screen, add reactions, etc. The Large Overlay, however, does not appear full screen in my screen recording. It doesn't appear anywhere in my screen recording. Would love to transition from the small PRESENTER...

Read more

item.title: switch between windows, full screen
item.author: invalid@example.com (ddownn)
item.dc:creator: ddownn
item.content:encoded:
I would like to be able to be able to command-tab to/from the full screen preview window. When I am in the full screen view, command-tab takes me to another application, but the only way to get back to the full screen window seems to be finding the OBS icon on the dock, which is super annoying. Is there any way to make this happen? I have disabled using trackpad gestures and I am not going to use those to switch between apps. I just want command tab to work like it 'usually' does. I am using...

Read more

item.title: No sound for my shared videos
item.author: invalid@example.com (Toffeye)
item.dc:creator: Toffeye
item.content:encoded: Hi! Hoping anyone here can help me with that: I`m streaming live via OBS and Zoom (Mac Book Pro) in my coaching sessions and share lyric- videos with sound via my Streamdeck. Unfortunately, I cannot hear the sound of the videos mysel and I cannot share the sound with the participants in my session. You only see the video next to me in the scene without sound. Which audio setting do I have to change here, what am I doing wrong? I'm looking forward to a solution to my sound problem. Thanks!!

item.title: Canon EOS Webcam Utility Fix
item.author: invalid@example.com (briandeitch)
item.dc:creator: briandeitch
item.content:encoded:
Hi all-

Thought I'd share this fix since I didn't see it posted on here.

Running:
  • MacOS Sonoma v14.1.1
  • OBS v30.0.0
  • Canon EOS M6 Mark II
  • EOS Webcam Utility v1.1
  • EOS Webcam Utility Pro v2.0.30 <---Tested this version too

I woke up Monday morning and fired up my setup, and the EOS Webcam Utility was no longer displayed in the device drop-down menu in OBS for my video capture device. After hours of messing with it, I finally figured out it was an update in MacOS v14.1.1...

Read more

item.title: NDI™ Runtime not found
item.author: invalid@example.com (jongriffin111)
item.dc:creator: jongriffin111
item.content:encoded:
"NDI™ Runtime not found.
Download the installer here: https://ndi.palakis.fr/runtime/ndi-runtime-4.5.1-macOS.pkg"

Recurring message every time I open OBS and, of course, no NDI source available. I've downloaded and tried to install, re-install, erase OBS and abs-studio in LIBRARY>>Application Support, tried previous versions and multiple NDI installs - all to no avail.

Here are the specs :

MacBook Pro (15-inch, 2019)
Mojave 10.14.6
OBS : 25.0.8
obs-ndi-4.9.0
ndi-runtime-4.5.1-macOS...

Read more

item.title: Solution for NDI on M1 Macs´
item.author: invalid@example.com (ThommiTechnik)
item.dc:creator: ThommiTechnik
item.content:encoded:
Dear all,

as a lot of us, I also struggled with NDI on my M1 Mac. Today I got it working, and I wanted to share my solution with you:

- Go into /Programs, and choose "Show Contents" from NDI Video Monitor. Go into "Contents > Frameworks" and copy the "libndi_advanced.dynlib"
- Chang into "usr/local/lib", and paste this file
- rename the "libndi4.dynlib" (like e.g. "old_libndi4.dynlib")
- rename "libndi_advanced.dynlib" to "libndi4.dynlib"
- start OBS, and you'll see the NDI Sources again...

Read more

item.title: AVerMedia's GC553G2 HDMI 2.1 Video Capture Card at 4k60p Capture is FAKE
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zolja007)
item.dc:creator: Zolja007
item.content:encoded: Very sad day to see this product not perform... I just saw the "grand" update for MacOS M1/M2/M3 update, and boy what an insult to Mac owners. Promising 4k60p capture for all, just to find out today that it will NOT capture 4k60p on the Silicon(M) chips but capped at 4k30p like every other capture card... Very sad day indeed...

item.title: YouTube Streaming choose account?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ibrewster)
item.dc:creator: ibrewster
item.content:encoded:
When setting up YouTube streaming in OBS, it "recommends" to connect account. When I do that, however, it just shows my primary account. How do I "switch accounts" to a different account that I am a manger of? I'm trying to stream to the company account, not my personal one.

Or do I just need to use the stream key option?

item.title: Background removal not found in filters

item.content:encoded: I downloaded the Background Removal plugin and followed the installation process, but the plugin is not there when I click on 'filters'. I've uninstalled/reinstalled obs, but to no avail. Not showing in filters at all. Any tips how I can fix this? Thx

item.title: OBS doesn't recognize SSL 12 audio interface microphone input
item.author: invalid@example.com (boejiden69)
item.dc:creator: boejiden69
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I recently picked up an SSL 12 audio interface. When in OBS, the only drop-down for the input is "SSL 12." Selecting that for a microphone input does nothing, and it still receives no audio input from my mic.

I'm trying to configure a livestreaming setup from a digital audio workstation (FL Studio) out to OBS and YouTube. The ideal setup is being able to record desktop audio from FL Studio and having that as one input in OBS. The other is an input for my microphone so I can...

item.dc:creator: justfitjessie
item.content:encoded: Hi everyone. I need to help. I can't figure out why my zoom camera won't show what is showing on my OBS system! Any ideas?

item.title: Obs für Mac OSX Mojave: Kamera schaltet sich kurz ein und aus bei Programmstart
item.author: invalid@example.com (GerryV)
item.dc:creator: GerryV
item.content:encoded:
Hallo an alle

Mein Name ist Gerry: Ich bin Musiker und streame seit Beginn der Corona Pandemie. Bisher lief alles immer immer reibungslos. Seit der Neuinstallation auf meinem Mac mit Mojave habe ich folgendes Problem:
Meine Logitech Kamera schaltet sich kurz ein und aus bei Programmstart und gibt dann auch kein Bild mehr, obwohl die Webcam am Mac angeschlossen ist. Facetime funktioniert ganz normal, OBS erkennt die Kamera auch, gibt aber kein Bild. Kann mir da jemand helfen? Hab schon wo...

Read more

item.title: There is not sufficient disk space to continue recording. after upgrade to OBS Studio 30.0.2
item.author: invalid@example.com (tongds)
item.dc:creator: tongds
item.content:encoded:
There is not sufficient disk space to continue recording. after upgrade to OBS Studio 30.0.2 on Mac Silicon
Local folder works fine. Not check external hard drive yet.

downgrade to 30.0.1, not working anymore.

item.title: Image Slideshow Question
item.author: invalid@example.com (robcrouch)
item.dc:creator: robcrouch
item.content:encoded:
I have an image slideshow reading photoshop from a folder on my Imac. When I add photos to the folder Id like it to auto refresh the slideshow in OBS. Is there anyway that can happen? at the moment it doesn't seem to update unless I go in and re-add the folder.


Thanks
